record.title: PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR
record.narrative:
PRIVILEGES OF THE FLOOR -- (Senate - July 17, 2008)

[Page: S6945]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that Colin Jones, a fellow from the Idaho National Laboratory, be granted the privilege of the floor for the duration of the Energy bill, S. 3268.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
